thread.section_title: Keepkey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keepkey | keepkey.com
thread.title: Elijah Sora Kim
thread.title_full: Keepkey reviewed by Elijah Sora Kim

author: Elijah Sora Kim
title: Elijah Sora Kim
text: This hardware wallet is incredibly easy to set up and use which makes it great for people just getting into bitcoin. It incredibly sleek which makes it beautiful to look at and the materials that were used to make it are of top quality making it very durable. I feel very safe having my bitcoins in this wallet knowing that no one can nor will be able to steal my coins. The integration of altcoins and shapeshift make it perfect for future use in any other cryptocurrency. Do not be alarmed that KeepKey is a relatively new company, they are one of the best in the business. I have wanted this specific hardware for a year and I am extremely glad that I made the decision to purchase it.
